narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Lucy Sanchez is a Speech-Language Pathologist,   provider based in Palm Desert, CA. From 2018-01 through 2018-09, this provider received $203K in Medicaid payments across 3K claims serving 763 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 94% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 92507 (92507). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2018-09, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
